text: Flashback is a 1990 American adventure comedy movie written by David Loughery and directed by Franco Amurri. It stars Dennis Hopper, Kiefer Sutherland, Carol Kane and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == Other websites == * * * Category:1990 adventure movies Category:1990 comedy movies Category:1990s American adventure movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Flashback (1990 movie)
